articles.title: Kim Jong Un Elected Chairman of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Elected Chairman of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Monday made public the decision "On electing the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un to the top post of our party".
					 The decision said:
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK discussed the agenda item on electing the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un to the top post of our party.
					
					 He is the supreme leader of our party and people as he is guiding the revolutionary cause of Juche only to victory while demonstrating before the whole world the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea with his outstanding idea, extraordinary leadership and noble virtue.
					
					 He opened a new chapter for immortalizing President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to give steady continuity to the revolutionary history of the great leaders on this land, clearly indicating the true way for our party to achieve the final victory of the revolution by regarding it as the supreme programme to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Under his guidance the monolithic leadership system of the party has been firmly established throughout the party and society and the single-minded unity of the party and the revolutionary ranks have been consolidated, registering signal successes one after another in all fields including politics, military affairs, economy and culture.
					
					 The dignity and national power of Songun Korea have been demonstrated at the highest level despite the worst adversity and the Mallima era when prosperity is being achieved by racing against time in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development, a great heyday in creation and construction, is being ushered in on the land of the country. This reality is the precious fruition of the great leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He aroused the whole party, the entire army and all the people to the 70-day campaign of loyalty and led them to make unprecedented, miraculous achievements, making sure that the Seventh Congress of the Party is glorified as glorious one of victors.
					
					 The report on the review of the work of the Party Central Committee made by him at the congress serves as an immortal banner clearly indicating the bright way for our Party and the developing revolution to follow and a great programme that paves an everlasting path of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Our army and people who have dynamically advanced along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under his invincible guidance keenly realized that eternal victory of the WPK and rosy future of the great Paektusan nation lie in following him.
					
					 Absolute is the prestige of Kim Jong Un boundlessly respected and praised by our people and progressive mankind.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK decides to elect Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK reflecting the unanimous will and desire of all Party members, service personnel and people.

articles.title: Official Report of First Plenary Meeting of 7th WPK Central Committee Issued
articles.content:
Official Report of First Plenary Meeting of 7th WPK Central Committee Issued
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- An official report of the First Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was released on Monday.
					 According to it, the First Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the WPK was held here on Monday. 
					
					 Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un guided the plenary meeting.
					
					 Present at the meeting were members and alternate members of the C.C., the WPK, and members of the Central Auditing Commission of the WPK.
					
					 The plenary meeting elected the Presidium of the Political Bureau and the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK.
						
					
					 Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK
					
					 Kim Jong Un
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae
						
					
					 Members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK
					
					 Kim Jong Un
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Man Gon, Yang Hyong Sop, Ro Tu Chol, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Myong Su, Kim Won Hong and Choe Pu Il
						
					
					 Alternate Members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK
					
					 Kim Su Gil, Kim Nung O, Pak Thae Song, Ri Yong Ho, Im Chol Ung, Jo Yon Jun, Ri Pyong Chol, No Kwang Chol and Ri Yong Gil
						
					
					 The plenary meeting elected vice-chairmen of the Party Central Committee and organized the Executive Policy Bureau and the Party Central Military Commission.
						
					
					 The Executive Policy Bureau of the Party Central Committee
					
					 Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un
					
					 Vice-Chairmen of the Party Central Committee Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Yong Chol and Ri Man Gon
						
					
					 The Party Central Military Commission 
					
					 Chairman Kim Jong Un
					
					 Members Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Myong Su, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Man Gon, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Yong Gil and So Hong Chan
						
					
					 The plenary meeting appointed department directors of the C.C., the WPK and the editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the C.C., the WPK.
						
					
					 Department Directors of the C.C., the WPK
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Man Gon, Ri Il Hwan, An Jong Su, Ri Chol Man, Choe Sang Gon, Ri Yong Rae, Kim Jong Im, Kim Jung Hyop, Kim Man Song and Kim Yong Su
						
					
					 Editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Party Central Committee
					
					 Ri Yong Sik
						
					
					 The plenary meeting elected chairman, first vice-chairman, vice-chairman and members of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 
					
					 Chairman of the Control Commission of the Party Central Committee
					
					 Hong In Bom
					
					 First Vice-Chairman Jong Myong Hak
					
					 Vice-Chairman Ri Tuk Nam
					
					 Members Kim Yong Hwan, Kim Kum Chol, Kim Yong Son and Kim Myong Chol.

articles.title: Chairman, Vice-Chairwoman of Central Auditing Commission of WPK Elected
articles.content:
Chairman, Vice-Chairwoman of Central Auditing Commission of WPK Elected
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The First Plenary Meeting of the Seventh Central Auditing Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea took place on Monday.
					 Present at the meeting were members of the Party Central Auditing Commission elected at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 The plenary meeting elected Choe Sung Ho as chairman of the Party Auditing Commission and Pak Myong Sun as its vice-chairperson.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Closing Address at Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Closing Address at Seventh Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un made the following closing address at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Monday:
					 Dear delegates,
					
					 The historic Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea is now winding up its work upon making great successes amid the high degree of political enthusiasm and the best wishes and expectations from all the delegates, Party members, service personnel and other people. 
					
					 Through this Congress of the WPK we have fully displayed the invincible might of the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and demonstrated to the whole world the unshakable conviction and will to accomplish the cause of socialism, the cause of the Juche revolution, under the unfurled banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK will be etched for ever in the history of our Party as a glorious meeting of victors that laid lasting groundwork for the implementation of the cause of the Juche revolution and set up a new milestone in carrying out the cause of socialism.
					
					 I am very gratified that this Congress of the WPK was convened at an important, historic turning point in implementing the cause of the Juche revolution and has an adequate discussion on the items on the agenda, and I extend warm thanks to all the delegates, Party members, service personnel and other people who made positive efforts to ensure the Congress a success. 
					
					 Comrades,  
					
					 Now as I am standing here before declaring the Seventh Congress of the WPK closed, I am reflecting on the grim decades of our Party that has travelled a long and arduous road. My yearning grows stronger for President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il who made so much painstaking efforts to the last moments of their great lives to hand down this powerful Korea to posterity tiding over the severe tempest of history.  And this brings back vivid memories of the names and faces of the unforgettable revolutionary comrades who passed away earlier. They supported the leader's intentions and cause, showing no affectation and vacillation in both good and bad times, and worked with devotion for the development of the WPK and the victory of the socialist cause. 
					
					 Though they are not here with us, we should never forget the precious revolutionary comrades-in-arms who went against all odds as genuine comrades of our Party and devoted themselves heart and soul to the WPK and the leader, the country and the people during the period under review. 
					
					 Comrades, 
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK summed up with pride the great victories our Party and people gained during the period under review in carrying out the cause of the Juche revolution under the wise leadership of the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 This Congress has unfolded a magnificent blueprint for realizing our people's dreams and ideals by building a powerful socialist country on a full scale under the banner of modelling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. It has also advanced important tasks to be tackled in achieving independent reunification of the country and accelerating the cause of global independence. 
					
					 The grand objectives, revolutionary line and policies put forward by the Congress will be an inspiring banner instilling into all Party members, service personnel and other people confidence in the future and victory and powerfully rousing the whole Party, the entire army and all the people to the general onward march for the final victory of the revolution. 
					
					 At the Congress, in reflection of the unanimous will and desire of the whole Party and all the people, it was stipulated in Party Rules that the great Comrade Kim Jong Il is the eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Our Party will hold up General Kim Jong Il as its eternal leader, and staunchly champion and add eternal brilliance to his revolutionary ideology and exploits. 
					
					 The Congress elected a new leadership body of the Central Committee of the WPK, reflecting the will of its entire membership. 
					
					 That a new leadership body of the Central Committee of the WPK has been elected with the unanimous approval of all the delegates is a clear manifestation of the absolute support and trust in our Party of all its members and other people. 
					
					 I express my heartfelt thanks to the delegates, all Party members, service personnel and other people for having shown such great confidence in me.
					
					 Cherishing deep in my heart the greatest trust and expectations of you who have entrusted me with the heavy responsibility of the Chairman of the dignified Workers' Party of Korea, I will fight on undauntedly, offering myself without regret in the sacred struggle to hasten the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution pioneered in Mt Paektu; and I pledge myself to remain faithful to the revolution, holding our people in high esteem invariably and selflessly at any time, at any place and at any moment, even if my body is torn to pieces and I fall.
					
					 The newly elected Central Committee of the WPK will carry through the line and policies the Congress has advanced and fulfil the historic mission and responsibility it assumes in the implementation of the cause of the Juche revolution so as to live up to the deep trust and expectations of Party members and other people without fail.
					
					 Our Party will faithfully serve the people and fight it out for national prosperity and the people's well-being, holding high the slogan "Everything for the people, everything by relying on them!" always in the future as in the past, true to the great leaders' noble idea of "The people are my God."
					
					 Members of the leadership body of the Central Committee of the WPK, keeping deep in mind the weighty responsibility they assume on behalf of the WPK and the revolution, should be staunch vanguard fighters in implementing the instructions of the great leaders and the WPK's lines and policies and competent organizers and propagators who powerfully inspire the broad masses to putting the decision of the Congress of the WPK into effect.
					
					 Our Party and people are faced with very enormous tasks and imperialists and other hostile forces will keep persisting in their manoeuvres to hinder us.
					
					 However, we will surely win final victory as the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism brightly illumines the way ahead of us, there is the single-hearted unity of all the service personnel and people rallied firmly as one behind the WPK and the revolutionary armed forces infinitely faithful to the WPK are holding the red bayonet of invincibility.
					
					 Let us all vigorously fight for the completion of the socialist cause, independent reunification of the country and victory of the cause of global independence, firmly united around the Central Committee of the WPK under the unfurled banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Fully convinced that the revolutionary line and policies advanced by the Seventh Congress of the WPK will be carried out thoroughly and a great turn will be brought about in the implementation of the cause of the Juche revolution thanks to the indomitable spirit of offensive and heroic struggle of all the delegates and all Party members, service personnel and people who are unfailingly faithful to our revolution, I declare the historic Seventh Congress of the WPK closed.

articles.title: 7th WPK Congress Calls for General Offensive toward Complete Victory of Socialism
articles.content:
7th WPK Congress Calls for General Offensive toward Complete Victory of Socialism
Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on Monday made an appeal to all the servicepersons, youths and other people of the country.
					The appeal said that with the great victory of its 7th Congress the WPK clearly showed the whole world how it had performed tremendous feats for the country and the nation, the socialist revolution and the human cause of independence over the past 35 years when the history of human politics witnessed the most complicated and serious upheaval and confrontation and how the unity between the WPK and the people had been cemented on the basis of deep trust and sentiment in the manifold trial of history.
					
					It stressed that the main idea of the decision made at the 7th Congress of the WPK is to arouse the entire party, the whole country, the entire army and all the people again to the struggle for winning the final victory in the building of a thriving socialist nation as soon as possible and thus make them wage a general offensive in the period up to the 8th Congress.
					
					The 7th WPK Congress called upon all the servicepersons, youths and other people to launch a Mallima speed campaign of rapid progress and innovation for the implementation of its decision in every sector and unit, the appeal said, adding:
					
					The entire party, the whole country and all the servicepersons and civilians should dash toward the high eminence of a thriving nation at the speed of Mallima.
					
					Never tolerate but mercilessly squash any element contrary to the idea and intention of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and any slightest act of breaking our single-minded unity and backbiting at our Party's policies.
					
					Let us build an economic and highly-civilized power by dint of science and technology and thus make the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, our beloved motherland, the envy of the whole world.
					
					Let us put the nation's industry and agriculture on a modern, scientific and IT basis our own way and at the earliest date with our technology, efforts and resources and thus raise the level of the national economy to that of the most developed countries under the banner of self-development-first principle for turning everything of the country into wealth of socialism hard to find in other parts of the world, making the latest science and technology our possessions and creating everything with our materials.
					
					Let us turn our country into a matchless nuclear power by bolstering up the Juche-based nuclear force in quality and quantity to mercilessly stamp out the enemies challenging us, whether they are in sky or under ground or on the sea.
					
					Let all the people implement more thoroughly and steadily the Party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, each holding arms in one hand and a hammer or a sickle in the other.
					
					Let us raise the level of every factory and farm to that of the January 18 General Machinery Plant and the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm and build every structure into such spectacular edifice as the Sci-Tech Complex and Mirae Scientists Street.
					
					Let us create many famous works like "Echo of Mountain" representing the Mallima era along with a new legend of mountains of gold, fields of gold and sea of gold.
					
					Our trustworthy members of the Workers' Party!
					
					Take the lead in blazing a path, shoulder the heaviest load and stand in the van of a life-and-death struggle.
					
					Every Party cell should become an advancing group, a death-defying corps and a beacon in the Mallima speed campaign.
					
					The stalwart men and officers of the People's Army, the closest comrades-in-arms of the Party Central Committee!
					
					Build up the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army into the strongest forces in the world to reliably defend the all-people struggle for implementing the decision of the 7th Party Congress with matchless arms.
					
					The heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class!
					
					Display more highly and honorably the precious title given by the great Kim Jong Un era in the present Mallima speed campaign.
					
					The youths, staunch fighters to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche!
					
					Create in succession new legendary tales about the heroic youth by making the youthful vigor pervade the Mallima era and hang the doorplate of a thriving nation before anyone else.
					
					The servicepersons, youths and other people intensely loyal to the Party!
					
					Let us successfully complete the building of a thriving nation and proudly erect a Mallima statue of Juche Korea on behalf of the present generation.
					
					Let us open the gate to national reunification with the victory in the Mallima speed campaign and hand down to posterity the great prosperous Korea where the entire nation enjoys happiness and wellbeing through generations.
					
					Convinced that the patriotic devotion of all the servicepersons, youths and other people of the country full of awareness to greet all victories and glory together with the Party on the eternal path of following the Party defying any hardships and sacrifices will surely result in a new miracle of history, the 7th Party Congress ardently calls once again for winning a world-startling great victory in the Mallima speed campaign.
					
					Make an all-out charge for the complete victory of socialism by launching the Mallima speed campaign!

articles.title: Seventh Congress of WPK Closes
articles.content:
Seventh Congress of WPK Closes
Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) closed on Monday.
					The congress discussed its third agenda item "On revising rules of the WPK" and adopted a decision.
					
					According to the decision, the revised "Rules of the WPK" stipulate that its top post is chairman of the WPK and he is its supreme leader who represents the party and leads the whole party.
					
					As regards this, secretary of the Central Committee of the party is renamed vice-chairman, chief secretary, secretary and vice-secretary of the provincial, city and county party committees and basic party organizations chairman and vice-chairman and the Secretariat of the Party Central Committee the Executive Policy Bureau and the Secretariat of the provincial, city and county party committees the Executive Policy Office.
					
					Some chapters and provisions of the present rules of the party and their contents were revised and supplemented as required by the developing reality.
					
					The congress discussed the fourth agenda item "On electing the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un to the top post of our Party".
					
					Kim Yong Nam made an address on electing Kim Jong Un to the top post of the WPK.
					
					He said that Kim Jong Un is the supreme leader of the WPK and the Korean people who is successfully carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche which was started in Mt. Paektu and has made a victorious advance.
					
					He went on:
					
					The past four years in which the WPK has made the revolution with Kim Jong Un as its top leader have witnessed the continuity of the fiercest confrontation with the hostile forces and have been proud days during which the signal victories and great events to be specially recorded in the history of the nation have taken place one after another despite the worst adversity.
					
					In this period Kim Jong Un has powerfully demonstrated the dignity and national power of socialist Korea at the strongest level with his outstanding leadership and foiled the hostile forces' vicious moves to stifle it, thus providing a solid foundation for the final victory.
					
					Unshakable are the firm faith and will of the WPK, the army and the people of the DPRK to win every victory and glory on the road of single-mindedly upholding the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					Kim Yong Nam courteously proposed the congress to elect Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK, reflecting the unanimous will of all Party members, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and people.
					
					Hwang Pyong So, Jon Yong Nam, Ju Yong Gil, Ri Mong Gil and Thae Hyong Chol, delegates of every provincial party organization, in their speeches fully supported and approved the proposal on electing Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK, its top post.
					
					They expressed their determinations to absolutely trust and follow Kim Jong Un only in any storm and stress and staunchly fight under the leadership of the Party Central Committee in the future, too, just as they had dynamically made long journeys of the revolution following the great leaders.
					
					The congress elected Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK.
					
					The election of the central leadership organ, the fifth agenda item, took place.
					
					The congress declared that Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un was elected as member of the Party Central Committee, member of the Political Bureau of the Party Central Committee, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Party Central Committee and chairman of the Party Central Military Commission, according to the rules of the WPK and the rules of the election of the supreme leadership organ of the WPK.
					
					The congress elected the Party Central Committee.
					
					It, to begin with, nominated candidates for the members and alternate members of the Party Central Committee.
					
					129 candidates for members and 106 candidates for alternate members of the Party Central Committee were elected members and alternate members of the Party Central Committee with unanimous approval of the delegates.
					
					The congress elected the Party Central Auditing Commission.
					
					15 candidates for members of the Party Central Auditing Commission were elected its members with unanimous approval of the delegates.
					
					The delegates were informed of a decision of the First Plenary Meeting of the 7th Party Central Committee.
					
					The results of the election of members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and members and alternate members of the Political Bureau of the Party Central Committee were announced.
					
					The results of the election of vice-chairmen of the Party Central Committee were announced and it was informed that the Executive Policy Bureau was organized.
					
					The delegates were informed that the Party Central Military Commission was organized.
					
					It was informed that department directors of the Party Central Committee and the editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Party Central Committee, were appointed.
					
					The results of the election of the Control Commission of the Party Central Committee were announced.
					
					The delegates were informed of a decision made at the First Plenary Meeting of the 7th Party Central Auditing Commission.
					
					An appeal of the Seventh Congress of the WPK to all service personnel of the KPA, the youth and people "Let us make all-out charge for the complete victory of socialism by launching the Mallima speed campaign!" was announced.
					
					Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, made a closing address at the congress.
					
					The Seventh Congress of the WPK held in the presence of Kim Jong Un, the great leader of the WPK and the Korean people, was a significant grand assembly as it marked a historic watershed in the sacred drive to accomplish the great cause of Paektu under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mass Rally and Public Procession Take Place
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mass Rally and Public Procession Take Place
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass rally and public procession took place at Kim Il Sung Square with splendor on Tuesday in celebration of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The moment Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, appeared at the tribune of honor at the square, the cheers of "hurrah!" rocked heaven and earth, rubber balloons flew into the sky above the square and fireworks were displayed. 
					
					 He acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the crowd.
					
					 He was presented with bouquets by members of the Korean Children's Union. 
					
					 Taking the tribune of honor were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of the Party Central Committee, chairpersons of the provincial party committees and commanding officers of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Yun Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, Pu Yong Uk, head of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, Cha Sang Bo, head of the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China, the participants in the Seventh Congress of the WPK, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, those who performed labor feats in the 70-day campaign, the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the WPK, overseas Koreans, foreign diploma
					
					 tic envo
					
					 ys and representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, made a speech.
					
					 Noting that the Seventh Congress of the WPK was a political event to be specially recorded in the history of the WPK and the DPRK, he said that the congress elected Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK, reflecting the unanimous will and desire of the whole party, the entire army and all the people.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK was an expression of the intense loyalty and absolute trust of the army and people of the DPRK in him and a great revolutionary event guaranteeing the far-sighted plan of the party and the revolution, the country and the nation.
					
					 He extended the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the WPK, reflecting the unanimous feelings of all party members, service personnel and people across the country.
					
					 Upon authorization of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, Kim Yong Nam extended on behalf of the Party Central Committee the warmest thanks to all party members, service personnel and people for having concluded the 70-day campaign of loyalty with victory and glorified the Party Congress as a great revolutionary jubilee.
					
					 He pointed out that Kim Jong Un in his report made at the congress laid down the strategic line and set forth overall tasks for completing the cause of socialism of Juche under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism- Kimjongilism. 
					
					 He underlined the need for all party members, officials and other people to turn out in the struggle to carry out the decision made by the 7th Congress of the WPK with the same vim and vigor as they displayed in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					
					 Then followed the public procession of hundreds of thousands of working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The columns of the public procession passed the square brimming over with all service personnel and people's great emotion and joy of having elected Kim Jong Un chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 All the participants extended the greatest glory and warmest thanks to him who glorified the Seventh Congress of the WPK as the grand political festival to be specially recorded in the party history.
					
					 Kim Jong Un warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering participants of the public procession and masses
					
					 Letters reading "Kim Il Sung", "Kim Jong Il", "Kim Jong Un", "Devotedly Defending Leader", "Single-minded Unity", "Seventh Congress" and other letters and the flags of the WPK and the DPRK were depicted on the square.
					
					 The military band performed at the end of the public procession, making formations to depict the emblem of the WPK and letters "Victory" while playing "Ode to General Kim Jong Un".
					
					 At the end of the public procession, the crowd again broke into cheers of "hurrah!" and fireworks were displayed and many rubber balloons flown.
					
					 Kim Jong Un warmly acknowledged the enthusiastically cheering masses at the platform of the tribune of honor.

articles.title: Evening Gala and Torchlight Procession Held
articles.content:
Evening Gala and Torchlight Procession Held
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- An evening gala of youths and students and torchlight procession of the young vanguard for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place at Kim Il Sung Square on Tuesday evening.
					 Taking the tribune of honor were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairpersons of provincial party committees and persons who performed labor feats in the 70-day campaign of loyalty.
					
					 Present there on invitation were participants in the Seventh Congress of the WPK, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the WPK and overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here and other foreign guests.
					
					 When the song "Glory to Our Great Party" resounded forth, youths and students started dancing and portrayed a floral basket on the square reflecting the warm thanks and wishes for the WPK.
					
					 "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu", "We'll Follow Our Party Forever" and other songs were played and fireworks were displayed to decorate the evening gala conspicuously.
					
					 Then it was followed by the torchlight procession of the young vanguard. 
					
					 A column of the shock brigade members who completed the construction of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 as another monumental edifice in the Songun era in the run-up to the Seventh Congress of the WPK proceeded first.
					
					 They presented figures of Mt. Paektu and red flag and letters reading "Revolutionary Spirit", "Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" and "Love for People", while making dynamic changes of formation to represent the party emblem. They fully showed the picture of the single-minded unity of youth rank, united close around the great party, which is vigorously advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism in the spirit of heroic youths of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Fireworks were shot up to the sky.
					
					 The evening gala and the torchlight procession clearly demonstrated the immutable faith and will of the five million young vanguard members determined to creditably discharge their honorable mission and duty as reserve forces, advancing group and wing of the WPK and as the masters of the great Paektusan youth power in carrying out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation under the revolutionary banner of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Banquets Celebrate 7th Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Banquets Celebrate 7th Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- There took place banquets in celebration of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at Mokran House, the People's Palace of Culture, Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and other places of Pyongyang Tuesday.
					 Present there were leading officials of the party, state and army including Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae who are members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK, participants in the 7th Congress of the WPK, delegates of friendly parties, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and members of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and the congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, Yang Hyong Sop and Kim Won Hong spoke at the banquets.
					
					 The speakers said that all the service personnel and people are full of great joy of having elected the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK at its 7th Congress, the congress of victory and glory to be specially recorded in the history of the great party of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 They extended the noblest tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the greatest glory to Kim Jong Un, reflecting the warm loyalty of all the party members, service personnel and other people.
					
					 The speakers noted that the congress was a significant one that provided a fresh landmark in the struggle of our party, army and people to accomplish the socialist cause of Juche under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and guaranteed the eternal future of the Korean revolution.
					
					 They said:
					
					 When we take hold on the revolutionary line set forth by Kim Jong Un at the historic party congress, the independent dream and ideal of the people will be translated into reality and the country will throw its rays as the powerful country to be looked up by the world in the near future.
					
					 They called for thoroughly implementing the tasks set forth at the party congress by making steady advance and continued innovations with the same spirit and stamina with which they glorified the 7th Congress of the WPK with special events of the national history and great victory and thus effecting a fresh turn in building a thriving socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), on Monday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I received with pleasure news that Comrade Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK at its 7th Congress.
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you and the Central Committee of the WPK on behalf of the C.C., CPC and on my own behalf.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship personally provided and cultivated by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries with great care is the precious asset common to the two countries.
					
					 The Chinese party and government attach great importance to the Sino-DPRK relations. 
					
					  We will make efforts together with the DPRK side to bring happiness to the two countries and their peoples and contribute to peace, stability and development in this region by steadily developing the Sino-DPRK friendship and cooperation, proceeding from the great phase of the Sino-DPRK relations.
					
					 I wish the Korean people fresh success in carrying out the cause of socialism under the leadership of the WPK headed by Chairman Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 It was handed to an official concerned by the Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK Tuesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organizations, Personages
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Organizations, Personages
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from foreign organizations and personages on Tuesday congratulating him upon his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included the Asian-Pacific regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Oceanic regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, the Japan-Korea Cultural Interchange Association, the Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge Association, the Saitama Prefecturual People's Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship and Solidarity, the Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Aichi Society for Promoting Japan-DPRK Education and Cultural Exchange, the Society for Promoting Friendship among Japan and North and South of Korea, the Shikoku Liaison Society for Japan-DPRK Friendship, the Fukuoka Prefectural Association for Japan-DPRK Friendship, Takashi Ishida, advisor to Osaka of the Citize
					
					 ns Solidarity Demanding Earlier Normalization of the Relations between Japan and DPRK and the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for Promoting Cultural, Academic and Citizens Exchange, Ekan Ikeguchi, high priest of the Saifukuji-Temple of Japan, Japanese media person Shunichi Narita, Japanese cameraman Takashi Ito and the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Nampho, May 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Nampho Port on Tuesday for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were captains and crewmen of the Togo-flagged ship Rich Honor and the Chinese Taipei-flagged ship Zhang Hong 1.
					
					 Speakers extended the highest glory and warm congratulations to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 They praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for performing in developing the WPK into the invincible and steel-strong party.
					
					 They lauded Marshal Kim Jong Un for demonstrating the dignity and national power of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea by wisely leading the WPK.
					
					 They hoped the Korean people would achieve greater success in their struggle for carrying out the decision of the Congress under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK.
					
					 They expressed belief that only victory and glory would be always in store of the WPK dynamically advancing forward a final victory.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK People Hail Kim Jong Un's Election as WPK Chairman
articles.content:
DPRK People Hail Kim Jong Un's Election as WPK Chairman
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the news that the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) elected the dear respected Kim Jong Un to its top post, the army and people of the DPRK have extended their highest respects and warm congratulations to him.
					 They are unanimous in saying that his election to the chairman of the WPK is a great auspicious event as it guarantees the rosy future and prosperity of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Hong Chol Jun, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), told KCNA:
					
					 KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un ushered in a golden age of strengthening the revolutionary armed forces with his idea of Juche-based army-building, strategy and tactics and distinguished commanding art, firmly determined to accomplish the great cause of Paektu with arms.
					
					 The KPA under his commandership has grown into the most powerful army in the world, equipped with latest offensive and defensive means, which is ready to defeat at one stroke any formidable enemies who dare infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 We, servicepersons, will readily risk our lives to defend the Party and the leader, the country and the people, mindful that the victorious advance of the Songun (military-first) revolution is ensured by our intense loyalty to the Supreme Commander.
					
					 Yun Jae Hyok, manager of the Sangwon Cement Complex, said:
					
					 Our people's dreams and ideals are being translated into reality under the wise leadership of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 His election to the top post of the WPK will reliably guarantee the eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 Ri Hye Suk, chairwoman of the management board of the Samjigang Co-op Farm in Jaeryong County, said:
					
					 We, agricultural workers standing on the first line trench of the first echelon in defence of socialism, are now replete with a great joy at the special event of the nation.
					
					 We will remain faithful to the guidance of Comrade Kim Jong Un, top leader of the WPK, and devote all our wisdom and zeal to the implementation of the decision of its Seventh Congress.
					
					 We will surely reap a bumper crop this year by displaying the same working spirit as the preceding patriotic peasants did to uphold the Party with increased grain production.

articles.title: Great Auspicious Event Adding Glory to DPRK
articles.content:
Great Auspicious Event Adding Glory to DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- All people in the DPRK are rejoicing over the news that the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at its 7th Congress.
					 Ho Ryong Ho, a department director of the Ministry of Electric Power Industry, told KCNA that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK is a historic event of great significance in strengthening the WPK and a great national event.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un has long led the WPK and the Korean revolution since he began accompanying leader Kim Jong Il in carrying on the Songun revolution.
					
					 He has further enriched the ideological and theoretical treasurehouse of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism and brought about a radical turn in bolstering up the self-defensive capabilities of the country.
					
					 A number of great achievements have been made in the general advance for building   an economic giant.
					
					 Servicepersons and people in the country have been keenly moved by his outstanding leadership ability, matchless pluck and noble virtue.
					
					 Officials of the ministry are fully determined to uphold his idea and leadership with loyalty, cherishing deep in mind the pride of electing him as the WPK chairman.
					
					 Ri Hye Jong, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, said:
					
					 The election of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un to the top post of the WPK is an expression of absolute trust and strong support to him who has demonstrated the dignity and invincibility of the great Paektusan nation all over the world by leading the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					 He encouraged the people to overcome grief at the loss of leader Kim Jong Il and provided a large flower garden of loving care for people by pursuing benevolent and all-embracing politics.
					
					 Our army and people are full of revolutionary enthusiasm to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun pioneered in Mt. Paektu, upholding him in high esteem as the center of unity and leadership.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the army and people of the country, who are advancing under the leadership of the WPK headed by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK Led by Kim Jong Un Displays Its Dignity to Full
articles.content:
WPK Led by Kim Jong Un Displays Its Dignity to Full
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), founded and guided by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, is now fully displaying its dignity with the dear respected Kim Jong Un elected to the top post of the Party at its Seventh Congress.
					 Kim Jong Un has developed the WPK into the great Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Party and an invincible integral whole that firmly established the oneness of ideology and leadership.
					
					 He set forth such ideas and theories as the eternal strategy of the Korean revolution for independence, Songun and socialism, the three-point strategy of attaching importance to the people, the army and the youth, the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force and the self-development-first idea, thus bringing a radical turn in increasing the national strength.
					
					 He made sure that the WPK conducts its activities on the principle of giving top priority to the demands and interests of the people, regarding it as the Party's mode of existence to make selfless and devoted efforts for them.
					
					 Under his people-priority politics, the WPK has displayed its dignity as the mother party forming a harmonious whole with the popular masses and working hard to translate their ideals into reality.
					
					 With his steadfast stand for independence against imperialism and invariable Songun politics, Kim Jong Un has bolstered up the powerful war deterrent for justice and peace to reliably defend socialism from every challenge of the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 Under his guidance, the DPRK people have made a rapid progress in the building of an economic giant, ushering in a great golden age of construction and making a new history of sea of gold.
					
					 The WPK headed by him will as ever win victory and glory only, enjoying the absolute support and trust from the popular masses.

articles.title: Greetings to United Malays National Organization of Malaysia
articles.content:
Greetings to United Malays National Organization of Malaysia
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to the Supreme Council of the United Malays National Organization of Malaysia on the occasion of its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The message said that for the past seven decades the party has made great successes in the work to realize the national harmony and unity and build developed Malaysia under the slogan of "One Malaysia".
					
					 It wished the party greater success in its activities to strengthen the party and achieve the country's prosperity and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger.

articles.title: IIJI Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
IIJI Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) led by Secretary General Kenichi Ogami left here Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Dominica
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Dominica
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Officials Should Become Faithful Servants of the People" was brought out in booklet by a Dominican publishing house on April 30 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on December 28, Juche 81 (1992), clarifies the tasks and ways for the officials to become faithful servants of the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Mexican Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Mexican Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was posted by the Mexican National Youth Institute of the Juche Idea on its website on May 3 on the occasion of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is a proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Seminars in Romania, Britain and Kyrgyzstan Congratulates WPK upon Its 7th Congress
articles.content:
Seminars in Romania, Britain and Kyrgyzstan Congratulates WPK upon Its 7th Congress 
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Romania, Britain and Kyrgyzstan from May 1 to 4 on the occasion of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said in a report that the 7th Congress of the WPK which is to be held under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un would become a historic event, a fresh landmark for making the Korean revolution and accomplishing the cause of human independence.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, noted that in the DPRK the working people including the working class are enjoying an independent and creative life under the wise leadership of the WPK.
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party who doubles as chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, said that the WPK has registered brilliant successes in building socialism while smashing the imperialists' moves for stifling the DPRK under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan are convinced that the 7th Congress of the WPK will work out a bright blueprint for bringing earlier the final victory of the Korean revolution and the country's reunification, he added.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Kyrgyzstan.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Observe 7th Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Observe 7th Congress of WPK
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) from April 25 to May 4.
					 The Guang Ming Daily of Malaysia carried an article titled "By steering the fresh era of creation and change" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It lauded the WPK for advancing along the only victory and glory under the leadership of the great leaders and Marshal Kim Jong Un for more than 7 decades and leading the DPRK to prosperity.
					
					  The Thai Xing San Daily allotted one whole page to an article accompanied with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It stressed that the congress would comprehensively review the successes achieved by the WPK under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and work out a bright blueprint for bringing earlier the final victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Congolese newspaper Le Patriot allotted one whole page to an article titled "Glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It praised the WPK, which is shining with the idea, exploits and august names of the great leaders, for giving fuller play to its invincible dignity under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se elige como Presidente de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se elige como Presidente de PTC
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ACNC) -- El VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea hizo publica el dia 9 la resolucion "Sobre la eleccion del estimado companero Kim Jong Un en el supremo cargo de nuestro Partido".
					La resolucion va como sigue:
					
					El VII Congreso del PTC discutio la agenda sobre la eleccion del querido companero Kim Jong Un en el supremo cargo del Partido.
					
					Kim Jong Un es el Maximo Dirigente de nuestro Partido y  pueblo quien con su destacada ideologia, extraordinaria direccion y noble virtud conduce a la unica senda de la victoria la causa revolucionaria del Juche exaltando la dignidad y poderio de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y Corea de Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Al abrir una nueva era del cumplimiento de la causa de eternidad de lider, dio continuidad eterna a la historia revolucionaria de los grandes Lideres antecesores e ilumino claramente la ruta a seguir por la revolucion coreana en lograr la victoria final tomando como maximo programa del Partido la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo. 
					
					Bajo su orientacion, se ha establecido estrictamente el sistema de la unica direccion del partido en todo el partido y toda la sociedad, consolidado mas la unidad monolitica del Partido y las filas revolucionarias y se crean sucesivamente los exitos asombrosos en todos los dominios de la politica, los asuntos militares, la economia y la cultura. 
					
					Aun en medio de la peor situacion adversa, se manifiesta a la maxima altura la dignidad y el poderio estatal de la Corea del Songun y se abre la era de Mallima y de creacion y construccion en que se logra la prosperidad de la patria acortando el siglo con el poderio de autofortalecimiento, lo cual es el noble fruto de la gran direccion del Mariscal.
					
					El Mariscal llamo a todo el Partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a la campana de 70 dias de fidelidad y condujo al frente de esta para que se alcanzaran los exitos milagrosos y haga brillar el VII Congreso del Partido como conclave de  triunfadores y de gloria.
					
					El informe sobre el balance de las labores del Comite Central del Partido, pronunciado por el Mariscal en el conclave, sirve de inmortal bandera y gran programa que ilumina el futuro radiante para el desarrollo del Partido y la revolucion del Juche. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos han marchado vigorosamente por el unico camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo bajo la invicta orientacion del Mariscal. En ese proceso sintieron de corazon que en apoyar al Mariscal residen la eterna victoria del PTC y el radiante futuro de la potencia Paektusan.
					
					Es absoluta la autoridad del Mariscal quien recibe el gran respeto y elogio del pueblo coreano y los demas progresistas del mundo.
					
					El VII Congreso del PTC decide elegir al Mariscal como Presidente del PTC reflejando la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los militantes del Partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y los habitantes.

articles.title: Publica informacion sobre el primer pleno del septimo periodo del CC de PTC
articles.content:
Publica informacion sobre el primer pleno del septimo periodo del CC de PTC 
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo publicada el dia 9 la informacion sobre el primer pleno del septimo periodo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Segun la informacion, el presente pleno tuvo lugar el dia 9 en esta capital bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Asistieron los miembros y miembros suplentes del CC del PTC y los miembros de la Comision Central Revisora del PTC. 
					
					El pleno eligio el Presidium del Buro Politico y el Buro Politico del CC del PTC. 
					
					
					
					El Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC
					
					Kim Jong Un 
					
					Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y Choe Ryong Hae
					
					
					
					Miembros del Buro Politico del CC del PTC
					
					Kim Jong Un 
					
					Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Man Gon, Yang Hyong Sop, Ro Tu Chol, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Myong Su, Kim Won Hong y Choe Pu Il 
					
					
					
					Miembros suplentes del Buro Politico del CC del PTC
					
					Kim Su Gil, Kim Nung O, Pak Thae Song, Ri Yong Ho, Im Chol Ung, Jo Yon Jun, Ri Pyong Chol, No Kwang Chol y Ri Yong Gil
					
					
					
					La sesion plenaria eligio a los vicepresidentes del CC del PTC y organizo el Buro de Asuntos Politicos del CC del PTC y la Comision Militar Central del PTC.
					
					
					
					El Buro de Asuntos Politicos del CC del PTC
					
					Presidente del PTC: Kim Jong Un 
					
					Vicepresidentes del CC del PTC: Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi, Kim Yong Chol y Ri Man Gon
					
					
					
					La Comision Militar Central del PTC
					
					Presidente: Kim Jong Un
					
					Miembros: Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Myong Su, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Man Gon, Kim Won Hong, Choe Pu Il, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Yong Gil y So Hong Chan
					
					
					
					La sesion plenaria denomino a los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC y el editor jefe del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, organo del CC del PTC.
					
					
					
					Jefes de departamento del Comite Central del Partido: Kim Ki Nam, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Man Gon, Ri Il Hwan, An Jong Su, Ri Chol Man, Choe Sang Gon, Ri Yong Rae, Kim Jong Im, Kim Jung Hyop, Kim Man Song y Kim Yong Su
					
					
					
					Editor jefe del Periodico Rodong Sinmun: Ri Yong Sik
					
					
					
					La sesion plenaria eligio al presidente, primer vicepresidente, vicepresidente y miembros de la Comision de Control del CC del PTC.
					
					
					
					Presidente: Hong In Bom
					
					Primer vicepresidente: Jong Myong Hak
					
					Vicepresidente: Ri Tuk Nam
					
					Miembros: Kim Yong Hwan, Kim Kum Chol, Kim Yong Son y Kim Myong Chol.

articles.title: Elegidos presidente y vicepresidente de CCR de PTC
articles.content:
Elegidos presidente y vicepresidente de CCR de PTC
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 el primer pleno del VII periodo de la Comision Central Revisora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea con la participacion de los miembros de dicha comision electos en el Congreso del Partido.
					  En esta reunion Choe Sung Ho y Pak Myong Sun fueron electos como presidente y vicepresidente de la Comision Central Revisora del Partido, respectivamente.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso de clausura en VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un pronuncia discurso de clausura en VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronuncio el discurso de clausura en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea efectuado el dia 9.
					El texto completo va como sigue:
					
					Companeros delegados:
					
					El historico VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea concluye sus labores con un gran exito en medio del gran entusiasmo politico, los mejores votos y la esperanza de todos los delegados, miembros del Partido, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y otros sectores del pueblo.
					
					A traves de este evento hemos demostrado plenamente el invencible poderio del gran Partido kimilsungista y kimjongilista y nuestra inconmovible fe y voluntad de llevar al cabo la causa socialista, la causa revolucionaria del Juche, enarbolando la bandera del kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo.
					
					El Congreso quedara registrado eternamente en los anales de nuestro Partido como cita de triunfadores y de gloria que ha sentado una solida base para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y que ha marcado un nuevo jalon para llevar a cabo la causa socialista.
					
					Muy satisfecho del exitoso debate de los puntos del orden del dia en ese evento convocado en un momento de suma importancia para la causa del Juche, les agradezco de todo corazon a todos los delegados, miembros del Partido, oficiales y soldados del ejercito y demas sectores del pueblo sus ingentes esfuerzos por el exito del congreso.
					
					Companeros:
					
					De pie en este lugar para anunciar la clausura del Congreso, he echado una mirada retrospectiva de la historia de nuestro Partido que ha venido librando una lucha prolongada y ardua. Esto me hace mas intensa la anoranza a nuestro Lider Kim Il Sung y General Kim Jong Il que hasta los ultimos momentos de su grandiosa vida dieron todo lo suyo para entregar a la posteridad esta poderosa Corea superando las grandes tempestades de la historia. Tambien me vienen a la mente los rostros y los nombres de los inolvidables companeros revolucionarios que se nos fueron de este mundo al cabo de una vida consagrada al fortalecimiento del Partido y el triunfo de la causa socialista en fiel acato al proposito y la causa de su lider, con la invariable lealtad tanto en los dias ordinarios como en los dificiles. 
					
					Nunca debemos olvidar a esos inapreciables companeros que, si bien no estan presentes en este lugar, superaron las duras pruebas y se entregaron de lleno por el Partido, el Lider, la patria y el pueblo como verdaderos companeros de nuestro Partido, durante el periodo del que rendimos cuenta. 
					
					Companeros:
					
					Con un gran orgullo el Congreso hizo el balance del gran triunfo que nuestro Partido y pueblo cosechamos en el cumplimiento de la causa del Juche bajo la acertada direccion de los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il durante el periodo que analizamos. 
					
					El evento trazo el gran proyecto de construir en todos los dominios una potencia socialista bajo la consigna de transformar a toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y hacer realidad el sueno del pueblo, asi como presento tareas importantes para lograr la reunificacion independiente de la patria y acelerar la verificacion de la independencia en el mundo.
					
					Las altas metas y las lineas y politicas revolucionarias planteadas por el Congreso infundiran la confianza en el porvenir y la fe en el triunfo a todos los miembros del Partido, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y el pueblo y como una bandera convocaran energicamente a todos ellos a la marcha general para la victoria final de la revolucion.
					
					En reflejo de la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los militantes y pueblo, el Congreso definio claramente en sus estatutos que el gran companero Kim Jong Il es el eterno lider del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					Con el como eterno lider, nuestro Partido defendera resueltamente y perpetuara sus ideas y hazanas revolucionarias. 
					
					De acuerdo con la voluntad de toda la militancia, el Congreso eligio el nuevo organo de direccion del Comite Central del Partido.
					
					Dicha eleccion que conto con la unanime aprobacion de todos los delegados constata el pleno apoyo y confianza de toda la militancia y el pueblo en nuestro Partido.
					
					Mi mas sincero agradecimiento a los delegados, todos los miembros del Partido, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y el pueblo por su gran muestra de confianza en mi.
					
					Hondamente conmovido por la gran confianza y esperanza que todos ellos han depositado en mi al confiarme el importante cargo de Presidente del prestigioso Partido del Trabajo de Corea, juro dar mi vida y luchar sin doblegarme en la sagrada obra para anticipar la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el Paektu y, aunque se me haga pedazos el cuerpo y sucumba, seguir siendo fiel a la revolucion en cualquier lugar y momento, con una actitud invariable y desinteresada.
					
					El recien electo CC del Partido ejecutara al pie de la letra las lineas y orientaciones planteadas en el Congreso y cumplira la mision y responsabilidad que asume para la causa del Juche, correspondiendo infaliblemente a la gran confianza y esperanza de los militantes partidistas y otros habitantes.
					
					En fiel acato a la noble idea de los grandes Lideres de considerar al pueblo como el cielo, nuestro Partido seguira siendo fiel al pueblo como en el pasado, enarbolando el lema !Todo para el pueblo y todo apoyandose en las masas populares!, y sera consecuente en su empeno por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Conscientes de la gran responsabilidad que asumen ante el Partido y la revolucion, los miembros del organo de direccion del CC del Partido seran fervorosas vanguardias en la materializacion del legado de los grandes Lideres y el lineamiento y la orientacion del Partido, y competentes organizadores y divulgadores que convocan energicamente a las amplias masas a cumplir la resolucion del conclave.
					
					Es muy importante la tarea revolucionaria que nuestro Partido y pueblo tienen por delante y los imperialistas y otras fuerzas hostiles seguiran maniobrando para impedir nuestro avance.
					
					Pero, el gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo nos ilumina el camino, todos los militares y civiles estan unidos monoliticamente en torno al Partido y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias ilimitadamente fieles a este son invencibles, y por tanto alcanzaremos infaliblemente la victoria final.
					
					Con la bandera del kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo en alto y unidos compactamente en torno al CC del Partido, luchemos todos con vigor por la culminacion de la causa socialista, la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la victoria de la causa del mundo por la independencia.
					
					Convencido de que se llevaran a cabo al pie de la letra la linea y las orientaciones revolucionarias planteadas en el evento y se dara un gran avance en el logro de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, en virtud del inflexible espiritu de ofensiva y la heroica lucha de todos los delegados, los miembros del Partido, los militares del Ejercito Popular y otros habitantes, ilimitadamente fieles a nuestra revolucion, declaro clausurado el historico VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: VII Congreso de PTC llama a librar ofensiva general hacia victoria total de socialismo
articles.content:
VII Congreso de PTC llama a librar ofensiva general hacia victoria total de socialismo 
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ACNC) -- El VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea emitio el dia 8 un llamamiento a todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular, los jovenes y los habitantes. 
					Con la gran victoria del VII Congreso del Partido, el PTC ha demostrado a todo el mundo como ha realizado grandes hazanas por la patria, la nacion, la revolucion socialista y la causa de verificacion de la independencia de la humanidad durante 35 anos pasados, periodo de caos y enfrentamientos mas complejos y serios en la historia politica humana, y como el Partido y el pueblo de Corea han logrado la unidad monolitica con la ferviente y solida confianza y sentimiento consanguineos aun en las pruebas de toda indole de la historia. 
					
					La idea principal de la resolucion del Congreso es movilizar de nuevo a todo el Partido, todo el pais, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo a la lucha por lograr cuanto antes la victoria final en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista en el periodo hasta el VIII Congreso del Partido.
					
					El VII Congreso del PTC llamo a todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular, los jovenes y los habitantes a desarrollar el movimiento de creacion de velocidad de Mallima registrando en todos los dominios y unidades grandes saltos e innovaciones para la materializacion de la resolucion del Congreso. 
					
					!Todo el partido, todo el pais, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, marchemos a galope de Mallima hacia la cima de un Estado poderoso y prospero! 
					
					!Frustremos despiadadamente los minimos elementos que contravienen a la idea y proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quebrantan la unidad monolitica y critican a espaldas las politicas del Partido! 
					
					!Construyamos la potencia economica y la civilizada con las ciencias y tecnicas para que todo el mundo admire la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, nuestra patria querida!
					
					!Convirtamos lo todo de la patria en las riquezas socialistas sin iguales en el mundo, y las ciencias y tecnicas ultramodernas en las nuestras, y realicemos lo mas pronto posible la modernizacion, la cientifizacion y la informatizacion a nuestro estilo de la industria y la agricultura, ateniendose a las tecnicas, fuerzas y recursos nacionales y en el principio de dar primacia al autofortalecimiento encaminado a nacionalizar todas las creaciones de la patria, de modo que la economia del pais tome la delantera de los paises mas avanzados!
					
					!Transformemos la patria como potencia nuclear sin rival mediante el fortalecimiento cuantitativo y cualitativo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de tipo jucheano capaces de aniquilar despiadadamente a los enemigos que nos desafien atrevidamente, aunque esten en el cielo, el subsuelo o el mar!
					
					!Que todo el pueblo, con el fusil en una mano y el martillo y la hoz en la otra, materialice mas estrictamente y constantemente la linea de desarrollo paralelo del Partido!
					
					!Elevemos el nivel de todas las fabricas y granjas al del Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero y la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon y levantemos los edificios arquitectonicos maravillosos como el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas y la Avenida de Cientificos Mirae!
					
					!Creen muchas obras maestras al estilo de "Eco de la montana" de la era de Mallima junto con nuevas leyendas de montana de oro, llanura de oro y mar de oro!
					
					!Los fidedignos militantes del Partido del Trabajo, abran brecha, lleven a cuestas las cargas mas pesadas y se lancen primero a las adversidades de vida o muerte!
					
					!Que todas las celulas partidistas se hagan patrullas, pelotones suicidas y antorchas de senal en el movimiento de creacion de velocidad de Mallima!
					
					!Los heroicos oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular, primeros companeros de armas del Comite Central del Partido, consoliden mas firmemente el ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu como fuerzas armadas sin rival en el mundo para defender a riesgo de la vida con armas la batalla de todo el pueblo por la materializacion de la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC!
					
					!La heroica clase obrera Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il, manifieste mas alta y honrosamente su noble titulo dado por la gran era de Kim Jong Un en el movimiento de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima!
					
					!Los jovenes denodados del cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, se hagan protagonistas de la era de Mallima, creen sucesivamente nuevos mitos de juventud heroica y pongan con sus propias manos la placa en la puerta del Estado poderoso y prospero!
					
					!Los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular, los jovenes y los habitantes infinitamente fieles al Partido, culminen victoriosamente la construccion de un Estado prospero y levanten la estatua de bronce de Mallima de la Corea del Juche en nombre de nuestra generacion!
					
					!Abramos el ancho camino por la reunificacion de la patria con el triunfo del movimiento de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima y leguemos a las generaciones venideras la gran Corea prospera donde todos los coterraneos convivan felizmente generacion tras generacion!
					
					Convencido de que el entusiasmo patriotico y de lealtad de todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular, los jovenes y los habitantes, llenos de la decision de acoger todas las victorias y glorias junto con el Partido sin hacer caso de cualesquier pruebas y sacrificio en el camino de apoyar el Partido, creara sin falta nuevos milagros de la historia, el VII Congreso del Partido llama una vez mas fervientemente a lograr gran victoria asombrosa en el movimiento de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima.
					
					!Adelante con la ofensiva general hacia la victoria total del socialismo avivando las llamas de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima!

articles.title: Clausurado VII Congreso de PTC
articles.content:
Clausurado VII Congreso de PTC
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el dia 9 el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En el conclave, se abordo la tercera agenda "Sobre la enmienda de los estatutos del PTC" y se adopto la resolucion.
					
					Segun la resolucion, los enmendados "estatutos del PTC" estipulan que el maximo cargo del partido es el Presidente del PTC y este es maximo dirigente del partido que representa y dirige todo el partido. 
					
					Al respecto, determinaron el cargo del secretario del Comite Central del PTC como vicepresidente, y el del secretario jefe, el secretario y el subsecretario de los comites del partido en las provincias, de ciudades y distritos y de las organizaciones de base del partido como presidente y vicepresidente. Y cambiaron el nombre del Secretariado del CC del PTC con el Buro de Asuntos Politicos y el del Secretariado del Comite del PTC en las provincias, ciudades y distritos con el Departamento de Asuntos Politicos.
					
					Ademas, enmendaron y suplementaron parcialmente los capitulos, los articulos y los contenidos de los presentes estatutos del partido conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo.
					
					Y discutio, ademas, la cuarta agenda "Sobre elegir al estimado camarada Kim Jong Un en el cargo supremo de nuestro partido".
					
					Kim Yong Nam pronuncio las palabras para elegir al Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el cargo supremo del PTC.
					
					El senalo que el Mariscal es maximo dirigente del PTC y del pueblo coreano quien hereda y lleva a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche que se inicio en el monte Paektu y ha avanzado de manera triunfal, y prosiguio:
					
					Los cuatros anos pasados en que vinimos haciendo la revolucion sosteniendo al Mariscal en el primer cargo del PTC, fueron los dias de la mas enconada confrontacion con las fuerzas hostiles y el periodo orgulloso en que fueron logrados uno tras otro los triunfos y eventos sorprendentes a ser registrados particularmente en la historia de la nacion aun en medio de las adversidades extremas.
					
					En ese periodo, el Mariscal ostento vigorosamente en el maximo plano la dignidad y el poderio de Corea socialista  mediante su destacada orientacion, hizo anicos las tentativas represivas de las fuerzas hostiles y preparo el firme terreno para lograr la victoria final.
					
					Son inconmovibles la conviccion y voluntad del PTC, el ejercito y el pueblo de acoger todas las victorias y glorias en el camino de sostener fielmente la idea y la orientacion del Mariscal.
					
					Reflejando la unanime voluntad de los participantes en el congreso, los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo de todo el pais, el propuso cortesmente ante el presente congreso elegir al Mariscal como Presidente del PTC.
					
					En sus intervenciones, Hwang Pyong So, Jon Yong Nam, Ju Yong Gil, Ri Myong Gil y Thae Hyong Chol, delegados de las organizaciones provinciales del partido, apoyaron integramente a la propuesta de elegir al Mariscal como Presidente del PTC, maximo cargo del partido.
					
					Expresaron la decision de confiar y seguir absolutamente solo al Mariscal y luchar firmemente bajo la direccion del CC del PTC aun en las adversidades de toda indole como han venido marchando firmemente por el largo camino de la revolucion bajo la guia de los grandes lideres. 
					
					El conclave eligio al Mariscal como Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Tuvo lugar la eleccion del organo directivo central del PTC, quinta agenda.
					
					Segun el estatuto del PTC y el reglamento detallado de las elecciones del organo directivo supremo del PTC, el conclave proclamo la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Presidente del PTC como miembro del Comite Central del Partido, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido, miembro del Presidium del BP y presidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido.
					
					En el congreso se eligio el Comite Central del PTC.
